targets.query: SELECT "instant" FROM "framerate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mode("ping") AS "Common", mean("ping") AS "Average" FROM "connection_latency" WHERE ("server" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("packet_loss") AS "Latency" FROM "connection_latency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "steamid" fill(none)
SELECT sum(*) AS :field FROM "network_updates" WHERE ("server" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(0)
SELECT mean("ping") AS "Latency" FROM "connection_latency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "steamid" fill(none)
SELECT mean("packet_loss") AS "Latency" FROM "connection_latency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ip", "steamid" fill(none)
